values: The Supremacy and Sweetness of God: How Not to Blaspheme GodThe Supremacy and Sweetness of God: How Not to Blaspheme God

Unless preachers herald the majesties of our Maker, we won’t give our people anything more than they can get anywhere else.Unless preachers herald the majesties of our Maker, we won’t give our people anything more than they can get anywhere else.
